column3: You shout it out,, but I can't hear a word you say
column4: I'm talking loud,, not saying much
column5: I'm criticized,, but all your bullets ricochet
column6: You shoot me down,, but I get up
column15: You shoot me down,, but I won't fall
column17: You shoot me down,, but I won't fall
column21: Cut me down,, but it's you who'll have further to fall
column23: Raise your voice,, sticks and stones may break my bones
column24: I'm talking loud,, not saying much
column31: Fired at the ones who run
